title: Beginning With Baby
description: Phoebe Finley's stepbrother left his new son, Rex, with her for the afternoon two weeks ago, and still has not returned. Phoebe has no experience with babies, and some of her neighbors are not too happy with the crying baby. But when handsome engineer Jackson Abbott storms into Phoebe's apartment to complain - he can't stop himself from helping her instead. Silhouette Romance - Special Edition
author: Christie Ridgway
